About Us 

We are a group that is diverse in thought, experience and background. We are united by our passion for delivering great outcomes through innovation, design, software, and analytics.  

The Readify Way 

As Readifarians, we live and breathe the following six core beliefs and subscribe to them with everything we think and do  - Embracing Diversity is one of these core beliefs.


​

How we embrace Diversity 

At Readify we place value on diversity and inclusion, not just because it’s the right thing to do, but because we rely on the skills of the most talented people, whoever they are, to deliver great outcomes to our clients and the community.   

We recognise the differences in each of our team members and their individual capability and believe the value they offer through their varied experiences and backgrounds is a powerful catalyst for innovation and ideas. 

We believe we have a responsibility to do everything we possibly can to improve diversity in our industry long-term. 

  • We openly recognise, embrace and encourage diversity in all its forms - regardless of background, race, belief, gender identity, marital status, sexual identity, age, or disability.​ 

  • The first stage of our recruitment process is blind, with all successful candidates progressed to the next stage of the recruitment process. 

  • Our people are selected for engagements based on their skills and capability​, and are respectful and supportive of the diverse preferences and attributes of their fellow team mates.​​ 

  • Our people ​use fun and thoughtful approaches such as Design Thinking when dealing with challenges and developing solutions. 

  • We're clear on our areas of strength and where we need to do better from a diversity perspective, and we invest people and budget into improving in these areas.​​​​ 

  • When organising social activities, we take the varied cultural and individual preferences of our people into account to ensure inclusivity. 

  • Designing good solutions demands our organisation to be representative of our diverse community, and have first person experience of the true challenges our end users face​.​ 

We live for our community 

We work at Readify because we love working with amazing people - fellow Readifarians, our clients, the tech community, and the future tech community - and we love what we do. We also enjoy sharing our knowledge and passion with the wider community. 

We attend and sponsor a variety of user groups and organisations around the country that support and/or facilitate growth of women in tech. Some of the events we support are: 


  • NodeGirls Australia – Supporting in general through providing mentors 

  • NodeGirls Perth – Creating the Perth chapter of NodeGirls 

  • Tech Girls Movement – Providing mentors for the 'Tech Girls are Superheroes' initiative as well as invovlement in the 'Superhero Daughter Day'

  • WiT QLD & WA Committees – Readafarians are active members of these committees 

  • ACS Women – Readifarians are active members of these committees 


What we offer 

  • 16 weeks paid parental leave for primary carers | 2 weeks paid parental leave for secondary carers 
  • Flexible & inclusive work-environment 
  • 20 x paid days of professional development per year (attend/ speak @ conferences, undertake courses and certifications 
  • $4200 Toolkit allowance to go out and buy your own tech
  • Profit share bonus
  • A defined career path​
  • Telstra benefits and discounts
